title: Custom Spark Job
description: Use this job when you want to run a custom JAR on Spark

id.title: Spark Job ID
id.description: The ID for this Spark job. Used in the API to reference this job. Allowed characters: a-z, A-Z, dash (-) and underscore (_). Maximum length: 63 characters.

klassName.title: Class name
klassName.description: Fully-qualified name of the Java/Scala class to invoke

submitArgs.title: Script args
submitArgs.description: Additional options to pass to the application when running this job.

script.title: Scala Script
script.description: Use this text field if you want to override the default behaviour, which is to run className.main(args)
